pages.text: It seems I will need to be adroit with vectors if I am to get anywhere in my studies. I have compiled some resources here on vectors if I find I do not know how to work with them.$(br2)First off, an enlightening video on the topic.

Secondly, it seems the practitioners of the $(thing)Psionic/$ arts had composed some quite effective lessons on vectors to teach their acolytes. I've taken the liberty of making a link on the next page.$(br2)Psionicists use different language for their spellcasting:$(li)A "Spell Piece" is their name for an action$(li)A "Trick" is their name for a spell$(li)An "Operator" is their name for a non-spell action
